name: The Impossible Knight Runner
description:
The Impossible Knight Runner is an intense hack-and-slash platformer full of creatures trying to put an end to your adventure.

Choose your knight, enter the dungeon and show no mercy, because no one will go easy on you.

Key Features:

  • Intense Gameplay:
One life. No checkpoints. Lot's of enemies. Once you start moving you have to keep going.

  • Unlockable Content:
Unlock new characters, levels and game modes as you progress through the game.


It's not going to be easy... and remember: Keep on moving!
